EmailTemplate.name: 17.CEM.CXS.none.L.G.E.2450.Email 4 - Success Stories
EmailTemplate.subject: Deliver the highest customer satisfaction at the lowest cost
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Looking to Grow Customer Loyalty? Omni-channel is improving customer care globally The Nokia Customer eXperience Solutions portfolio is evolving customer engagement. Through omni-channel care, the Nokia solutions suite fosters customer loyalty to generate ROI faster. Explore a collection of selected success stories from hundreds of operators worldwide to see how next generation customer experience management is benefitting their business. Connect with us © 2017 Nokia.
